entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 p.m. ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 9:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
